options.content: Good Supply Farm ‚Ä¢ Live Chicken Coop Monitoring

üìπ LIVE CAMERA FEEDS
üì∑ CSI Camera üé• USB Camera üè† Full Dashboard

targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/audio/level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level_db")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value >= 35.0 and r._value <= 45.0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value >= 35.0 and r._value <= 45.0)
  |> count()

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/audio/level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level_db")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value >= 46.0 and r._value <= 55.0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 20s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value >= 46.0 and r._value <= 55.0)
  |> count()

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/audio/level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level_db")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value >= 56.0 and r._value <= 70.0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 15s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value >= 56.0 and r._value <= 70.0)
  |> count()

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/audio/level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level_db")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 70.0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 70.0)
  |> count()

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/audio/events/activity_state")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "activity_state")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value: if r._value == "quiet" then 0.0
              else if r._value == "active" then 1.0
              else if r._value == "alarmed" then 2.0
              else if r._value == "distress" then 3.0
              else -1.0
    }))

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/sensors/bme680/all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Temperature")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/sensors/bme680/all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Humidity")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/sensors/bme680/all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "iaq")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "IAQ")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/sensors/bme680/all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pressure")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Pressure")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/sensors/bme680/all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "co2_equivalent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "CO2")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/sensors/bme680/all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "gas_resistance")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 }))
  |> yield(name: "Gas Resistance")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/audio/level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level_db")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "Decibels (dB)" }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/camera/csi/metadata")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Lux")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "Light Level (lux)" }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

panels.description:
Real-time chicken behavioral state tracking based on audio levels:
‚Ä¢ 0-10 dB: Sleeping/Quiet (dark blue)
‚Ä¢ 11-22 dB: Awake (blue)
‚Ä¢ 23-28 dB: Excited (green)
‚Ä¢ 29-35 dB: Alerting (yellow)
‚Ä¢ 36-45 dB: Distress (orange)
‚Ä¢ 46+ dB: Trouble (red)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/audio/level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level_db")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "Audio Level (dB)" }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/audio/level")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "level_db")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => {
    behavior = if r._value <= 10.0 then "üò¥ Sleeping/Quiet"
      else if r._value <= 22.0 then "üòä Awake"
      else if r._value <= 28.0 then "üéâ Excited"
      else if r._value <= 35.0 then "‚ö†Ô∏è Alerting"
      else if r._value <= 45.0 then "üò∞ Distress"
      else "üö® Trouble"
    return {r with _value: r._value, _field: behavior}
  })
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

panels.title: üîä Audio Level Trend with Behavioral Zones

panels.description: Sensor status based on data flow. Shows ONLINE if water data received in last 2 minutes, OFFLINE otherwise.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: -2m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/water/tank")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "percent_full")
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value: if r._value > 0 then 1.0
              else 0.0
    }))

panels.title: Water Sensor Status

panels.description: Shows water consumed over different time periods. Tank refills (negative deltas) are excluded. Green = normal, Yellow = moderate, Orange = high, Red = very high consumption. 'Selected Period' dynamically adjusts to dashboard time range.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/water/tank" and r["_field"] == "percent_full")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * -1.0 }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0.0)
  |> sum()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Last 1 Hour")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: -6h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/water/tank" and r["_field"] == "percent_full")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 2h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * -1.0 }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0.0)
  |> sum()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Last 6 Hours")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/water/tank" and r["_field"] == "percent_full")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 3h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * -1.0 }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0.0)
  |> sum()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Last 12 Hours")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/water/tank" and r["_field"] == "percent_full")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 6h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * -1.0 }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0.0)
  |> sum()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Last 24 Hours")

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/water/tank" and r["_field"] == "percent_full")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> difference()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * -1.0 }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0.0)
  |> sum()
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Selected Period")

panels.title: üíß Water Consumption by Time Period

panels.description: Shows consumption rate in percent per hour. Smoothed with 15-minute aggregation. Spikes indicate high consumption periods. Tank refills are excluded.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/water/tank")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "percent_full")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1h, nonNegative: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "Consumption Rate (% per hour)" }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "sensors")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mqtt_consumer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topic"] == "beeper/water/tank")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "percent_full")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: "Water Level (%)" }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

panels.title: üíß Water Consumption Rate Over Time
